item.title: Visual Studio Code
item.description: Visual Studio Code A code editor is an essential tool for every programmer and the tool with which we spend the majority of our time. The choice of an editor with which to write code is frequently a sensitive matter that sparks heated debate among programmers. As you are aware, there are other editors available, and you are free to use whatever you like, but after several years of using Sublime Text and Pycharm, I highly advise you to use Visual Studio Code.
